properties.name: camel.cluster.zookeeper.attributes
properties.description: Custom service attributes.

properties.name: camel.cluster.zookeeper.auth-info-list
properties.description: List of AuthInfo objects with scheme and auth.

properties.name: camel.cluster.zookeeper.base-path
properties.description: The base path to store in ZooKeeper.

properties.name: camel.cluster.zookeeper.connection-timeout
properties.description: Connection timeout.

properties.name: camel.cluster.zookeeper.connection-timeout-unit
properties.description: Connection timeout TimeUnit. Default is TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.

properties.name: camel.cluster.zookeeper.curator-framework
properties.description: Zookeeper CuratorFramework-style client.

properties.name: camel.cluster.zookeeper.enabled
properties.description: Sets if the zookeeper cluster service should be enabled or not, default is true.

properties.name: camel.cluster.zookeeper.id
properties.description: Cluster Service ID

properties.name: camel.cluster.zookeeper.max-close-wait
properties.description: Time to wait during close to join background threads.

properties.name: camel.cluster.zookeeper.max-close-wait-unit
properties.description: MaxCloseWait TimeUnit. Default is TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.

properties.name: camel.cluster.zookeeper.namespace
properties.description: ZooKeeper namespace. If a namespace is set here, all paths will get pre-pended with the namespace.

properties.name: camel.cluster.zookeeper.nodes
properties.description: The Zookeeper server hosts (multiple servers can be separated by comma).

properties.name: camel.cluster.zookeeper.order
properties.description: Service lookup order/priority.

properties.name: camel.cluster.zookeeper.reconnect-base-sleep-time
properties.description: Initial amount of time to wait between retries.

properties.name: camel.cluster.zookeeper.reconnect-base-sleep-time-unit
properties.description: ReconnectBaseSleepTime TimeUnit. Default is TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.

properties.name: camel.cluster.zookeeper.reconnect-max-retries
properties.description: Max number of times to retry.

properties.name: camel.cluster.zookeeper.reconnect-max-sleep-time
properties.description: Max time to sleep on each retry. Default is Integer.MAX_VALUE.

properties.name: camel.cluster.zookeeper.reconnect-max-sleep-time-unit
properties.description: ReconnectMaxSleepTimeUnit TimeUnit. Default is TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.

properties.name: camel.cluster.zookeeper.retry-policy
properties.description: Retry policy to use.

properties.name: camel.cluster.zookeeper.session-timeout
properties.description: Session timeout.

properties.name: camel.cluster.zookeeper.session-timeout-unit
properties.description: Session timeout TimeUnit. Default is TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.
